name: Out of Control feat. Bill Murray
name_original: Out of Control feat. Bill Murray
description:
You and your older brother sit down to play a video game adaptation of the Bill Murray movie Groundhog Day.

Your controller doesn't seem to do anything. Time appears to be looping. You choices don't appear to matter. But worst of all - you're stuck as player 2. 

There is more than 1 ending. Good luck.
